text: West Medan, (Indonesian: Medan Barat) is one of 21 administrative districts (kecamatan) in the city of Medan, North Sumatra, Indonesia. The boundaries of the district: * To the north : Medan Deli * To the south : Medan Petisah, Medan Maimun * To the east : East Medan * To the west : Medan Helvetia, Medan Petisah At the 2010 census, it had a population of 70,771 inhabitants. Total area is 6.14 km2 and the population density in 2010 was 11,526 inhabitants/km2.Biro Pusat Statistik, Jakarta, 2011. == Residents == The majority of this district population is Chinese, Malay, Batak, Indian, Javanese and Minangkabau. == Interesting Place == * Kesawan * Tjong A Fie Mansion * Medan City Hall == References == Category:Districts of Medan
title: West Medan
